roleset.name: establish a cost, value that's too low
roleset.note: UNDERVALUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'undervalue' based on blind transformation of 'value' frameset and adaptation based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from undervalue.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: While some assets have been written down, [others]-1 are undervalued *trace*-1 in the accounts, Mr. Bond maintained.

example.name: passive with margin
example.text: An investment in Chile's telephone company is carried at US$ 300 million but really worth US$ 500 million, and [the company's property portfolio]-1 is undervalued *trace*-1 by at least A$ 250 million, Mr. Bond said.
